org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure
Class BackgroundBandwidth

java.lang.Object
  org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.SimpleBandwidth
      org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.BackgroundBandwidth
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bandwidth
 class BackgroundBandwidth
extends SimpleBandwidth

BackgroundBandwidth extends SimpleBandwidth by adding background (non-Grid) traffic to the network as described in the userguide.

Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

Since:
JDK1.4

Constructor Summary
BackgroundBandwidth(GridSite siteA, GridSite siteB, float bandwidth)
          Initialises the link between siteA and siteB with bandwidth bandwidth.
 
Method Summary
 float availableBandwidth()
          Returns the available bandwidth for a new connection taking into account the bandwidth used by other non-Grid traffic.
 float currentBandwidth()
          Returns the current bandwidth for any ongoing connections taking into account the bandwidth used by other non-Grid traffic.

addConnection, connectionCount, dropConnection, maxBandwidth

Constructor Detail

BackgroundBandwidth

BackgroundBandwidth(GridSite siteA,
                    GridSite siteB,
                    float bandwidth)
Initialises the link between siteA and siteB with bandwidth bandwidth.

Parameters:
siteA - - the source site
siteB - - the destination site
bandwidth - - the bandwidth available on the link.
Method Detail

availableBandwidth

public float availableBandwidth()
Returns the available bandwidth for a new connection taking into account the bandwidth used by other non-Grid traffic.

Specified by:
availableBandwidth in interface Bandwidth
Overrides:
availableBandwidth in class SimpleBandwidth
Returns:
The bandwidth that would be available for a file transfer.

currentBandwidth

public float currentBandwidth()
Returns the current bandwidth for any ongoing connections taking into account the bandwidth used by other non-Grid traffic.

Specified by:
currentBandwidth in interface Bandwidth
Overrides:
currentBandwidth in class SimpleBandwidth
Returns:
The bandwidth available for current file transfers.
